Nonresponsive load with a basic concept of chalk pieces Algorithm depends on drop probability and the queue length There are a number of options for measuring drop probability and queue length Bottleneck link topology is the basic concept for developing a successfull algorithm This research can be future enhanced by Autotuning the estimation algorithm Building prototypes of applications
